NO.CAS-8(4)/2013/DIV.-I(Vehicle)
GOVERNMENT OF INDIA
BUREAU OF CIVIL AVIATION SECURITY
(MINISTRY OF CIVIL AVIATION)
‘A’ WING, JANPATH BHAWAN
JANPATH, NEW DELHI
Dated: 26/04/2013
AVSEC CIRCULAR NO.:04/2013
Subject:Permission for access of vehicle of Shri K. Rosaiah, the Governor of
Tamil Nadu, up to tarmac of all airports in the country – extension
beyond 01/05/2013.
Please refer to this Bureau Circular No. - 10/2012 dated 08/05/2012 on the
subject cited above.
2.
The competent authority has approved the extension of the facility of access of
vehicle of Shri K. Rosaiah, Governor of Tamil Nadu without escort up to tarmac of all
airports in the country for a period of one year beyond 02/05/2013.
This issues with the approval of Commissioner of Security (Civil Aviation).
(R.N Dhoke, IPS)
Addl. Commissioner of Security (CA)
Distribution as per list attached/ overleaf.
Copy to:
MCA (Shri U.K. Bhatia, U/Secretary), R.G.Bhawan, New Delhi: w.r.t. MCA letter no.
13024/39/2007-SS dated 15/04/2013.
